item.title: Mac
item.description: Mac # Box Drive # How to display Box Drive context menu System Preferences > Extensions Checl Box > Finder Extensions Siri # How to disable Siri # https://pc-karuma.net/mac-touch-bar-delete-siri-button/ Preview # https://support.apple.com/en-us/guide/preview/prvw15636/mac How to use two Mac apps side by side in Split View # https://support.apple.com/en-us/HT204948
